description: Change of use of the first floor mezzanine, first and second floor level from hostel (Class Sui Generis) into residential (Class C3) comprising of 3 x 1 bedroom flats self-contained flats; erection of obscure glazed screen to replace the existing railings above the roof of back addition at second floor level to the rear elevation in connection with its use as a terrace; installation of 1no window at second floor level, 2no windows at first floor level and 1no window at mezzanine floor level to the side elevation; installation of 1no window to the side of rear back addition at first floor level; provision of internal cycle storage.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
